tags.description: A map of tags to add to the resources

batch_size.description: The largest number of records that AWS Lambda will retrieve from your event source at the time of invocation.

bisect_batch_on_function_error.description: If the function returns an error, split the batch in two and retry.Only available for stream sources (DynamoDB and Kinesis).

collection_name.description: The name of the collection in the DocumentDB cluster. Only available for DocumentDB sources.

database_name.description: The name of the database in the DocumentDB cluster. Only available for DocumentDB sources.

enabled.description: Determines if the mapping will be enabled on creation.

event_source_arn.description: The ARN of the event source.

filter_pattern.description: The criteria to use for event filtering Kinesis stream, DynamoDB stream, SQS queue event sources.

full_document.description: Determines what DocumentDB sends to your event stream during document update operations. If set to UpdateLookup, DocumentDB sends a delta describing the changes, along with a copy of the entire document.

function_name.description: Unique name for your Lambda Function.

maximum_batching_window_in_seconds.description: The maximum amount of time to gather records before invoking the function, in seconds (between 0 and 300). Records will continue to buffer (or accumulate in the case of an SQS queue event source) until either maximum_batching_window_in_seconds expires or batch_size has been met

maximum_concurrency.description: Limits the number of concurrent instances that the Amazon SQS event source can invoke. Must be between 2 and 1000

maximum_record_age_in_seconds.description: The maximum age of a record that Lambda sends to a function for processing. Only available for stream sources (DynamoDB and Kinesis). Must be either -1 (forever, and the default value) or between 60 and 604800 (inclusive).

maximum_retry_attempts.description: The maximum number of times to retry when the function returns an error. Only available for stream sources (DynamoDB and Kinesis).

on_failure_destination_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of  SQS queue,SNS topic or S3 bucket the destination resource for failed invocations. Only available for stream sources (DynamoDB and Kinesis) and Kafka sources (Amazon MSK and Self-managed Apache Kafka).

parallelization_factor.description: The number of batches to process from each shard concurrently. Only available for stream sources (DynamoDB and Kinesis).

principal.description: The principal who is getting this permission.

starting_position.description: The position in the stream where AWS Lambda should start reading.

queue.description: The name of the Amazon MQ broker destination queue to consume. Only available for MQ sources.

topic.description: The name of the Kafka topics. Only available for MSK sources.
